statements: UPDATE earnings_call_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc.' AND transcript_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE earnings_call_sentiment SET transcript_text = 'Positive outlook on future growth' WHERE company_name = 'Microsoft Corp.';
UPDATE earnings_call_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.87, transcript_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc.' AND transcript_text LIKE '%positive%';
UPDATE earnings_call_sentiment SET transcript_text = 'Updated transcript text for analysis.', sentiment_score = 0.65 WHERE company_name = 'Microsoft Corporation' AND transcript_date = '2023-06-25';
UPDATE earnings_transcripts SET company_name = 'Company A', sentiment_score = 80 WHERE transcript_id = 1;
UPDATE investor_sentiments SET sentiment_category = 'Positive', company_name = 'Company B' WHERE sentiment_id = 3;
UPDATE earnings_transcripts SET transcript_text = 'Updated transcript text' WHERE transcript_id = 1;
UPDATE investor_sentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
UPDATE company_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 3.5 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE transcripts SET transcript_text = 'New Transcript Text' WHERE transcript_id = 10;
UPDATE company_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE company_id = 100 AND transcript_id = 500;
UPDATE transcripts SET transcript_text = 'Updated transcript text' WHERE transcript_id = 200;
UPDATE earnings_call_transcripts SET sentiment_score = 4.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE investor_sentiment SET sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE investor_id = 101 AND company_name = 'ABC Company';
UPDATE earnings_call_transcripts SET sentiment_score = 4.25 WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc.';
UPDATE analysts_reviews SET analyst_sentiment = 3.75 WHERE transcript_id = 101;
UPDATE earnings_calls_transcripts SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE transcript_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_category = 'Positive', sentiment_score = 0.9 WHERE analysis_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE earnings_calls_transcripts SET sentiment_score = 0.8, company_id = 'a8737088-2130-43dc-8a5d-5e61a1c87c50' WHERE transcript_id = '9e6d8ff8-1862-4376-b0ee-135e5ba522d2';
UPDATE companies SET industry = 'Technology', company_name = 'Updated Company Name' WHERE company_id = 'a8737088-2130-43dc-8a5d-5e61a1c87c50';
